metadata.title: CVE-2019-12814 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind 2.xthrough 2.9.9. When Default Typing is enabled (either globally or for aspecific property) for an externally exposed JSON endpoint and the servicehas JDOM 1.x or 2.x jar in the classpath, an attacker can send aspecifically crafted JSON message that allows them to read arbitrary localfiles on the server.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
